channel.title: Drew Gasparini on Bloomington Playwrights Project
channel.description: Recent content in Drew Gasparini on Bloomington Playwrights Project

item.title: Make Me Bad
item.description: by special arrangement with The Benge Group What happens when you fall in love with a serial killer? This gritty and sexy musical thriller follows the story of Daisy Harris, a young woman stuck in a small town with a dead-end job, an overbearing mother, and a troubled past. Desperate to escape but with nowhere to go, Daisy looks for anything to break the monotony of her meaningless life. She meets charming and cryptic Max, just as a string of unexplained murders rocks the town.
